rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: A welcoming entry with decorative elements aligning to Vastu principles; located in the south-east direction to promote positive energy.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: A spacious living area with natural light from windows placed on the eastern side for auspicious morning sunlight and a view of the central courtyard.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room with access to the kitchen; designed following colonial aesthetics and Vastu recommendations for communal spaces.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Located on the north-west corner of the ground floor in line with positive energy flow; features a large balcony overlooking the garden.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Adjacent to the master bedroom ensuring privacy; aligns with Vastu principles by being on a less prominent but peaceful section of the floor plan.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: A quiet space near the central courtyard to promote focus and creativity; positioned with eastern exposure for morning sunlight.

openings.description: Large entrance door designed to welcome positive energy while keeping security in mind.
Larger window for ample morning light and view of the central courtyard, following Vastu guidelines.
Balcony window providing ventilation and scenic view of the garden.

openings.location: living room to dining area door
openings.description: Separation between living and dining spaces with easy access while maintaining distinct zones.
Smaller window to ensure adequate ventilation without compromising privacy.
